en: He is not what he was ten years ago.
zh: 他已经不是十年前的他了。

en: Has he written the letter yet?
He is no longer a member of our club.
zh: 他已经不再是我们俱乐部的成员了。

en: Now that he has quit his job, I can't depend on him.
zh: 既然他已经辞职了，我就不能指望他了。

en: He should have finished it by now.
zh: 他现在应该已经完成了。

en: Has he gone already?
He is beyond hope.
He had already gone.
He has already gone home.
Has he returned yet?
Is he back already?
It is time he went to school.
He made a gesture of impatience.
zh: 他做了一个不耐烦的手势。

en: He is over the hill, you know.
zh: 他已经不行了，你知道的。

en: He couldn't overcome the desire for another cigarette.
zh: 他无法克服想再抽一支烟的欲望。

en: He lit another cigarette, but immediately put it out.
zh: 他又点了一支烟，但立刻就掐灭了。

en: He signed on for another year.
He is eager to meet her again.
I wonder if he dares try again.
zh: 我想知道他是否敢再试一次。

en: They made him do the work again.
zh: 他们让他重新做了这项工作。

en: He will be ruined for life.
He is no longer the shy boy he was.
zh: 他不再是以前那个害羞的男孩了。

en: He is now almost as tall as his father is.
zh: 他现在几乎和他父亲一样高了。

en: He's already left.
He barely escaped being hit and killed by a car.
It is all over with him.
It is about time he got settled down.
He is expected to come home soon.
He does not live there any more.
He got quite well.
He was almost asleep.
He will soon come back.
It will not be long before he leaves the hospital.
He is hard on fifty.
He is already here.
He ought to have arrived here.
He is no longer living here.
He no longer works here.
zh: 他已经不在这里工作了。

en: He doesn't work here anymore.
zh: 他已经不在这里工作了。

en: He was completely fagged out.
He will come back in another two weeks.
He has been on sick leave for a month now.
zh: 他已经请病假一个月了。

en: He avoids all troublesome tasks.
zh: 他逃避所有麻烦的任务。

en: He began to whistle a tune.
He's two years older than Mary is.
He pasted the notice on the door.
He seldom writes to his parents.
Seldom does he get angry.
He seldom gets angry.
He almost never gets angry.
He rarely gets angry.
He seldom writes to his father.
He hardly ever works.
He rarely gives up.
He has seldom had a meal with his family.
zh: 他很少和家人一起吃饭。

en: He scarcely ever watches TV.
Seldom did he visit there.
He seldom went there.
He rarely went there.
He almost never went there.
He rarely gives in, confronted with difficulties.
zh: 遇到困难时，他很少屈服。

en: He is making great progress in English.
He was appointed Japanese minister to Mexico.
zh: 他被任命为日本驻墨西哥公使。

en: I met her during my stay in Mexico.
zh: 我在墨西哥逗留期间遇到了她。

en: He pronounces English words in Spanish fashion because he is a Mexican.
zh: 他用西班牙语的方式发英语单词，因为他是墨西哥人。

en: He has a lot of difficulty seeing without his glasses.
zh: 他不戴眼镜就很难看清东西。

en: Even with his glasses, he doesn't see very well.
zh: 即使戴着眼镜，他也看得不太清楚。

en: He wore glasses.
He was wearing glasses.
He has a maid to wait on him.
He has a maid.
He employs a maid.
They made fun of Mary.
He put the ring on Mary's finger.
zh: 他把戒指戴在玛丽的手指上。

en: He is Mary's brother, I should think.
zh: 我想他应该是玛丽的哥哥。

en: I think he's Mary's older brother.
zh: 我觉得他是玛丽的哥哥。

en: He explained to Mary why he was late for her birthday party.
zh: 他向玛丽解释了他为什么她的生日聚会迟到了。

en: He's head over heels in love with Mary.
He sent a card to Mary.
zh: 他寄了一张卡片给玛丽。

en: Did he go to see Mary?
He has a date with Mary this afternoon.
zh: 他今天下午和玛丽有个约会。

en: He was sitting between Mary and Tom.
zh: 他坐在玛丽和汤姆中间。

en: He finally realized that Mary had made a fool of him.
zh: 他终于意识到玛丽把他当傻瓜耍了。

en: He wished Mary had told him the story.
zh: 他希望玛丽告诉他这个故事。

en: He courted disaster by reckless driving.
zh: 他鲁莽驾驶，简直是自找麻烦。

en: He gave me everything but took nothing in return.
zh: 他给了我一切，却没有要求任何回报。

en: He knows the art of making people feel at home.
zh: 他懂得如何让人感到宾至如归。

en: He makes everybody feel at ease.
zh: 他让每个人都感到轻松自在。

en: He ran the fastest of all.
He was laughed at by everybody.
Everyone laughed at him.
He is well spoken of by everybody.
He is left out of everything.
He has been loved by all.
He came after everybody had come.
zh: 他来的时候，大家都已经来了。

en: He spoke slowly enough for everyone to understand.
zh: 他说话很慢，足以让每个人都听懂。

en: He wanted to be respected by everybody.
zh: 他希望得到大家的尊重。

en: He is liked by everybody.
They were all surprised to see me there.
zh: 他们都惊讶地看到我在那里。

en: He drank a whole bottle of milk.
He is proud of being a musician.
He didn't know the fact that everyone knew.
zh: 他不知道那个每个人都知道的事实。

en: He is a tin god.
He stuck a meatball with his fork.
zh: 他用叉子叉起了一个肉丸。

en: He was fairly caught in the trap.
He was easily deceived and gave her some money.
zh: 他很容易被欺骗，给了她一些钱。

en: He is kind to those around him.
He will often go out for the whole day.
He talks as if he were an old man.
zh: 他说话像个老头儿似的。

en: He felt as if he were in a dream.
zh: 他感觉就像在做梦一样。

en: It seems like he had never met his father before.
zh: 他好像从来没见过他父亲。

en: He looks as if he were ill.
He lives as if he were a millionaire.
He speaks as if he knew the criminal.
zh: 他说话好像认识罪犯似的。

en: He went to the seaside only to be drowned.
zh: 他去海边结果却被淹死了。

en: He speaks as if he were an expert.
zh: 他说话好像是个专家似的。

en: He talks as if he were a teacher.
zh: 他说话好像是个老师似的。

en: He reddened like a schoolboy.
zh: 他像个小学生一样脸红了。

en: He told me about the accident as if he had seen it with his own eyes.
zh: 他跟我说起那次事故，好像他亲眼看到了一样。

en: He was so childish that he couldn't resist temptation.
zh: 他太幼稚了，无法抵挡诱惑。

en: Because he was just like a child, he yielded to temptation.
zh: 因为他就像个孩子一样，所以屈服于诱惑。

en: He behaved as if he were crazy.
zh: 他的行为举止像个疯子。

en: He looked as if he had not eaten for days.
zh: 他看起来好像几天没吃饭了。

en: He looked as if nothing had happened.
zh: 他看起来好像什么都没发生过一样。

en: He speaks as though he knew everything.
zh: 他说话好像什么都知道似的。

en: He acts as if he were a king.
zh: 他表现得好像自己是国王一样。

en: He speaks English as well as though he were an Englishman.
zh: 他说英语说得很好，就像一个英国人一样。

en: He speaks as if he had read the book before.
zh: 他说起话来好像以前读过这本书一样。

en: He talks as if he knew the secret.
zh: 他说话的口气好像他知道这个秘密一样。

en: He speaks as if he knew everything.
zh: 他说话的口气好像他什么都知道一样。

en: He talks as if he knew everything under the sun.
zh: 他说话的口气好像他什么都懂一样。

en: He speaks English as if he were an American.
zh: 他说英语说得好像他是个美国人一样。

en: He speaks as if he were an American.
zh: 他说英语说得好像他是个美国人一样。

en: He cried as if he were a boy of six.
zh: 他哭得像个六岁的孩子一样。

en: He showed his disapproval by raising an eyebrow.
zh: 他扬起眉毛表示不赞同。

en: He timed her in the marathon race.
zh: 他为她在马拉松比赛中计时。

en: He soon walked away.
He will come back soon.
I'm sure he'll be along soon.
zh: 我肯定他很快就会来的。

en: It will not be long before he recovers from his illness.
zh: 他很快就会从疾病中恢复过来。

en: It was not long before he arrived.
He is likely to arrive soon.
zh: 他很可能很快就会到达。

en: He leaves the parental roof soon.
zh: 他很快就要离开父母的家了。

en: He was soon acclimated to his new job.
zh: 他很快就适应了他的新工作。

en: He prepared for his imminent departure.
zh: 他为即将到来的离开做准备。

en: He will return to the game soon.
zh: 他很快就会回到比赛中。

en: He will be back before long.
He will be back soon.
He soon got accustomed to dormitory life and made two or three friends.
zh: 他很快就适应了宿舍生活，并且交了两三个朋友。

en: It won't be long before he comes to himself.
zh: 他很快就会清醒过来的。

en: He will return from Europe soon.
zh: 他很快就会从欧洲回来了。

en: It won't be long before he can play baseball again.
zh: 他很快就能再次打棒球了。

en: He soon recovered from the illness.
zh: 他很快就从疾病中康复了。

en: Will he be here soon?
He will soon get used to the climate here.
zh: 他很快就会适应这里的气候了。

en: He objected to the opinion of his manager.
He was so stupid as to tell a lie that might easily be found out.
zh: 他太蠢了，竟然说了一个很容易被发现的谎言。

en: He was disappointed at not being invited.
zh: 他因未被邀请而感到失望。

en: He struck a match, but quickly put it out.
zh: 他划着了一根火柴，但很快就把它熄灭了。

en: He struck a match.
He is totally dependent on his parents.
He looks just like his mother.
zh: 他看起来很像他的母亲。

en: He was not at all satisfied.
He is just an ordinary person.
He is not altogether a fool.
He has absolutely no respect for other people's feelings.
zh: 他完全不尊重别人的感受。

en: He is not honest at all.
He is entirely ignorant of the world.
zh: 他对这个世界完全无知。

en: He doesn't altogether trust me.
He has quite a novel idea.
zh: 他有一个相当新颖的想法。

en: He is quite in the wrong.
He is quite young in spirit.
He is quite a clever man.
He wasn't exactly a stranger.
zh: 他并不完全是个陌生人。

en: He lives in the woods all by himself.
zh: 他独自一人住在森林里。

en: He is heart and soul a Democrat.
zh: 他是个彻头彻尾的民主党人。

en: He is dead to all sense of shame.
He is a gentleman in every way.
zh: 他各方面都很有绅士风度。

en: He is quite a gentleman.
He's quite crazy about golfing.
He was an utter stranger.
He does not watch TV at all.
He stood in an upright position.
He fell head-long into the river.
He took poison by mistake.
He's still sponging off his parents.
He is still dependent on his parents.
He has made a promise to come again.
He is still standing.
He has not come yet. He may have missed the train.
zh: 他还没来。他可能错过了火车。

en: He has not come yet. Something may have happened to him.
zh: 他还没来。可能他出了什么事。

en: He hasn't come yet. He must have missed the bus.
zh: 他还没来。他一定是错过了公交车。

en: He hasn't come yet.
He's not here yet.
He isn't here yet.
He still wants to come.
He is too young to benefit from firm discipline.
zh: 他太年轻了，严厉的管教对他没有好处。

en: He came back again.
He is hardly more than a lad.
He doesn't want to leave the room because he's afraid that he'll catch another cold.
zh: 他不想离开房间，因为他害怕再次感冒。

en: He had the sensation that he was still on the waves.
zh: 他仍然有种感觉，好像还在波涛上。

en: He was also kind to animals.
He is still angry.
He is still not accustomed to city life.
zh: 他仍然不习惯城市生活。

en: He hasn't arrived yet.
The news that he was still alive reached us.
zh: 他还活着的消息传到了我们这里。

en: It is said that he is still alive.
People say that he's still alive.
I hear that he's still alive.
They say that he's still alive.
He is still alive.
He hasn't come of age yet.
He is still sound in mind and body.
The boss just chewed him out again.
He still has three servants.
He went to sea when he was only 14.
He made every effort to avoid yielding to the temptation to start drinking again.
zh: 他竭尽全力避免屈服于再次开始喝酒的诱惑。

en: He hasn't written the letter yet.
He still has not written the letter.
He is still young.
He's still young.
Did he fail again?
Has he failed again?
He is ashamed that he has failed again.
zh: 他为自己再次失败感到羞愧。

en: He has not realized his mistakes yet.
zh: 他还没有意识到自己的错误。

en: He still sticks to his opinion.
He lectured us about his pet theories again.
zh: 他又给我们讲了一堆他的个人理论。

en: He is yet to know the truth.
He doesn't know the truth yet.
He doesn't yet know the truth.
He hasn't appeared yet.
I have not yet done with the work.
He isn't back from the mountain.
He lost his umbrella again.
He is not down yet.
He is still full of energy.
He isn't back yet. He may have had an accident.
zh: 他还没回来，可能出事了。

en: He hasn't returned yet.
He still keeps up his interest in music.
zh: 他对音乐仍然保持着兴趣。

en: He has not come home yet, has he?
He is not old enough to live alone.
zh: 他还没到能独自生活的年龄。

en: He has not yet recovered consciousness.
He slipped into the bad habit again.
He is just a kid.
He is still sitting on the bench.
He still holds the heavyweight title.
zh: 他仍然保持着重量级冠军头衔。

en: He is still in bed.
He is still very much alive.
He is said to still be in Paris.
He is still somewhere about.
He is as great a thinker as ever lived.
zh: 他是有史以来最伟大的思想家之一。

en: He could still be alive somewhere.
zh: 他可能还活着，在某个地方。

en: He's just crying wolf again.
zh: 他不过是又在虚张声势，狼来了。

en: He is still on the payroll of the company.
zh: 他仍然是这家公司的雇员。

en: He came here again.
He'll be here again.
He is still here.
Is he still here?
He has yet to get in touch with his mother.
zh: 他还没有和他母亲联系。

en: He is still angry with you for your conduct.
zh: 他还在生你的气，因为你的行为。

en: He is still on the right side of forty.
He's only twelve, but he plays chess with the best of them.
zh: 他才十二岁，但他的棋艺却能和最厉害的人一较高下。

en: He started off with a good breakfast.
zh: 他从一顿丰盛的早餐开始了他的一天。

en: He is a kind of gentleman.
He began with a joke.
He began his lecture with a humorous anecdote.
zh: 他以一个幽默的轶事开始了演讲。

en: He seldom, if ever, laughs.
zh: 他很少笑，即使有，也很少。

en: He seldom, if ever, goes to the barber's.
zh: 他很少去理发店，即使有，也很少。

en: He spoke on more and more eloquently.
He became more and more famous.
He started his day with a good breakfast.
zh: 他从一顿丰盛的早餐开始了他的一天。

en: He came at an inopportune time.
The first thing Andrew did was to find his brother Simon and tell him.
zh: 安德鲁做的第一件事就是找到他的兄弟西蒙，并告诉他。

en: He began to study in earnest.
He led a sober life.
He is an earnest young man.
zh: 他是个很认真的年轻人。

en: He was just on the verge of going to sleep.
He was about to call her up, when her letter came.
zh: 他正要给她打电话，她的信就来了。

en: He is certainly a model English gentleman.
zh: 他确实是一位模范的英国绅士。

en: He made a speech highly appropriate to the occasion.
zh: 他发表了一篇非常适合场合的演讲。

en: He is the Edison of Japan.
He was really a child of his times.
zh: 他确实是他那个时代的产物。

en: He has no less than 100 dollars.
He is indeed a clever boy.
zh: 他确实是个聪明的孩子。

en: He plays the role of Macbeth with great skill.
zh: 他非常熟练地扮演麦克白的角色。

en: He repairs his own car.
What an eloquent speaker he is!!
zh: 他真是个雄辩的演说家！！

en: He has, say, fifty thousand yen.
He seldom, if ever, goes to church.
zh: 他很少去教堂，即使有，也很少。

en: He lived idly and found himself already forty years old.
zh: 他虚度光阴，发现自己已经四十岁了。

en: He was idly turning over the pages of a magazine.
He wore a blank look.
He finished the opening.
He is nothing but a child.
He is a mere child.
He bought a Honda.
He talks big but he's never done half the things that he said he has.
zh: 他只会吹牛，但他所说的事情连一半都没做过。

en: He devoted himself to the volunteer activity.
He translated Homer from the Greek into English.
zh: 他把荷马的作品从希腊语翻译成英语。

en: He is about my age.
He is almost six feet tall.
He is wiser and more careful than Bob.
zh: 他比鲍勃更聪明，更谨慎。

en: He came back by way of Honolulu.
He seldom, if ever, comes.
zh: 他很少来，即使有也很少。

en: He seldom, if ever, goes to see the movies.
zh: 他很少去看电影，即使有也很少。

en: He comes here almost every day.
He comes to see me nearly every day.
He has few or no books.
He hardly works.
He is little short of a genius.
He had little social life.
He came home at almost midnight.
zh: 他几乎在午夜时分到家。

en: He has little confidence in himself.
zh: 他对自己几乎没有信心。

en: He had few teeth.
He is all but dead.
He is little better than a beggar.
He is little, if at all, inferior to you.
zh: 他即使有不如你，也几乎没有。

en: He is little, if at all inferior to you.
zh: 他即使有不如你，也几乎没有。

en: He, like most Incas, believed this story.
zh: 他和大多数印加人一样，相信这个故事。

en: He could make himself agreeable to almost anyone.
zh: 他几乎能让任何人喜欢他。

en: He has all but finished the work.
zh: 他几乎完成了这项工作。

en: He is almost always at home.
He is almost always home.
He had to share the hotel room with a stranger.
zh: 他不得不和一个陌生人合住酒店房间。

en: He runs a lot of hotels.
He is the manager of a hotel.
He earns his living as a hotel boy.
zh: 他以在酒店当服务员为生。

en: He drove down to the hotel.
He's staying at a hotel.
He called a hotel for accommodations.
zh: 他打电话给酒店预订住宿。

en: He had difficulty in finding his way to the hotel.
zh: 他很难找到去酒店的路。

en: He stayed at a hotel for a couple of days.
Bodybuilding is his hobby so he has a very firm tight body with lots of muscle definition.
zh: 健美是他的爱好，所以他有一个非常结实紧致的身体，肌肉线条分明。

en: He stood aloof.
He stood all by himself.
He stood by himself.
He pressed the button and waited.
zh: 他按下了按钮，然后等待。

en: He stuck a flower in his buttonhole.
zh: 他在纽扣孔里插了一朵花。

en: He is cross with his boss.
He is loyal to his boss.
He lives in Boston.
He bought a round-trip ticket to Boston.
zh: 他买了去波士顿的往返票。

en: He came here by way of Boston.
zh: 他途经波士顿来到这里。

en: He has come from Boston.
He dropped a letter into the mailbox.
zh: 他把一封信投进了邮箱。

en: He is allergic to dust.
He felt in his pocket for his wallet.
zh: 他在口袋里摸索着找钱包。

en: He has fallen into the habit of putting his hands into his pockets.
zh: 他已经养成了把手插进口袋的习惯。

en: He was standing with his hands in his pockets.
zh: 他双手插在口袋里站着。

en: He felt in his pocket for his keys.
zh: 他在口袋里摸索着找钥匙。

en: He felt in his pocket for his lighter.
zh: 他摸了摸口袋，想找打火机。

en: He stood against the wall with his hands in his pockets.
zh: 他双手插在口袋里，靠墙站着。

en: He was standing by the gate with his hand in his pocket.
zh: 他手插在口袋里，站在大门旁。

en: He put his hands in his pockets.
He thrust the money into his pocket.
He emptied his pockets of their contents.
zh: 他把口袋里的东西都掏了出来。

en: He took something out of his pocket.
zh: 他从口袋里掏出一样东西。

en: He has much more money than I have.
He has a lot more money than I have.
He put an interesting idea before us.
zh: 他向我们提出了一个有趣的想法。

en: He was standing there with a vacant look.
He is tolerant in religious belief of others.
zh: 他在宗教信仰上对他人很宽容。

en: He did the work better than anyone else.
He decided to seek information elsewhere.
zh: 他决定到别处去寻找信息。

en: He had heard some other stories.
zh: 他听过一些其他的说法。

en: He threw the ball against the wall.
He kicked the ball.
He threw the ball.
He jumped to get a ball.
He got the ball.
He kicked the ball out of the ground.
He called the ball foul.
He put up his hand to catch the ball.
He kicked the ball into the goal.
He held a ball-point by the wrong end.
zh: 他用错误的一端握着圆珠笔。

en: He realized Paul had stood him up.

zh: 他将在纽约待两个星期。

en: He stayed in New York for three weeks.
zh: 他在纽约待了三个星期。

en: He made a lot of money in New York and went back to the small town where he was born.
zh: 他在纽约赚了很多钱，然后回到了他出生的小镇。

en: He patted me on the shoulder with a smile.
zh: 他笑着拍了拍我的肩膀。

en: He would smile his approval.
He patted me on the back with a smile.
He stared at her with hatred.
What a mean fellow he is!
How old he is!
How fast he can run!
How fast he runs!
What an impressive person he is!
What a bad boy he is!
I don't know why, but he seems to have it in for me.
zh: 我不知道为什么，但他好像跟我过不去。

en: How well he can skate.
How soundly he is sleeping!
He was somehow able to swim across the river.
zh: 他不知怎么的竟然游过了河。

en: He somehow managed to swim across the river.
zh: 他不知怎么的设法游过了河。

en: He could manage a week's holiday.
zh: 他可以抽出一个星期的假期。

en: How well he played!
What a genius he is!
He is misfortune.
What a tall boy he is!
What a clever boy he is!
What a big eater he is!
How big he is!
What a kind boy he is!
How kind of him to help us move on such a rainy day!
zh: 下这么大的雨，他竟然还来帮我们搬家，他真是太好了！

en: What a disagreeable fellow he is!
How fluently he speaks English!
What a fast swimmer he is.
He cried out what a nice day it was.
zh: 他大声喊道，今天天气真好啊！

en: He knows whatever.
He knows everything.
He wants to have everything his own way.
zh: 他什么都想自己说了算。

en: I am afraid he is going to spill the beans.
He makes mountains out of molehills.
What a nonsense he talks.
zh: 他说的都是些什么废话。

en: What a lot of books he has!
He hates Nancy.
He asked Nancy if she was free the next day.
zh: 他问南希第二天是否有空。

en: He contrived a means of speaking to Nancy privately.
zh: 他设法找机会和南希私下谈话。

en: He caught sight of Nancy getting into a taxi.
zh: 他看到南希上了出租车。

en: He tends to be idle.
He did nothing wrong; all the same he was severely punished.
zh: 他没做错什么，但还是受到了严厉的惩罚。

en: He did nothing but fold his arms.
zh: 他除了袖手旁观什么也没做。

en: He whispered something in her ear.
zh: 他在她耳边说了些悄悄话。

en: He began to play an old song.
Why did he fail in business?
zh: 他为什么会生意失败呢？

en: He had no idea why his wife left him.
zh: 他不知道他妻子为什么离开他。

en: He wondered to himself why his wife had left him.
zh: 他心里纳闷，他的妻子为什么离开了他。

en: Why can't he play tennis today?
zh: 他今天为什么不能打网球？

en: He gave no explanation why he had been absent.
zh: 他没有解释他为什么缺席。

en: Why did he go out in a hurry?
zh: 他为什么匆匆忙忙地出去？

en: I wonder why he was absent.
zh: 我想知道他为什么缺席。

en: I wonder why he did not come to the party.
zh: 我想知道他为什么没来参加聚会。

en: Why did he ask for so much money?
Why did he do that?
He looks blue for some reason.
zh: 不知什么原因，他看起来很沮丧。

en: I know why he did it.
zh: 我知道他为什么那样做。

en: He gave her what little money he had.
zh: 他把仅有的一点钱给了她。

en: He lent me what little money he had.
zh: 他把仅有的一点钱借给了我。

en: He searched the room for the lost key.
zh: 他在房间里寻找丢失的钥匙。

en: He is a pretty great guy.
He is the person who is difficult to come to terms with.
He is rather hard to get along with.
He is a man of spirit.
He has great confidence in himself.
He reads a good deal.
He is the last man to submit to authority.
He is very handsome.
He is quite a nice fellow and liked by everyone.
zh: 他是个很好的人，大家都喜欢他。

en: He cut the meat with a knife.
He was sharpening a knife.
He hurt his left hand with a knife.
He cut a twig from the tree with his knife.
zh: 他用刀从树上砍下一根树枝。

en: He turned a somersault.
He'll clutch at any straw.
zh: 他会抓住任何救命稻草。

en: He doesn't heed any advice.
zh: 他什么建议都听不进去。

en: He was impatient of any delays.
What is he like?
What line is he in?
What kind of job is he fit for?
zh: 他适合做什么样的工作？

en: How did he behave?
He's capable of wickedness of any kind.
zh: 他什么坏事都做得出来。

en: He is the first to come and the last to leave at any party.
zh: 在任何聚会上，他总是第一个来，最后一个走。

en: He writes home to his parents at least once a month, no matter how busy he is.
zh: 无论他有多忙，他至少每月都会给父母写信。

en: However tired he is, he writes in his diary before going to bed.
zh: 无论他有多累，他睡觉前都会写日记。

en: No matter how tired he is, he writes in his diary before going to bed.
zh: 无论他有多累，他睡觉前都会写日记。

en: No matter how angry he was, he would never resort to violence.
zh: 无论他多么生气，他都不会诉诸暴力。

en: How he has suffered!
No matter how hard he tried, my opinion didn't change.
zh: 无论他多么努力，我的看法都没有改变。

en: However hard he may try, he won't succeed.
zh: 无论他多么努力，他都不会成功的。

en: Regardless of how much he drank, he seems as sober as ever.
zh: 不管他喝了多少酒，他看起来总是很清醒。

en: He likes all kinds of sports.
zh: 他喜欢各种各样的运动。

en: He walked on and on.
He is quite frank with me about everything.
zh: 他对我很坦诚，什么都说。

en: He walked on and on, his dog following.
zh: 他不停地走啊走，他的狗跟着他。

en: He walked rapidly.
He has risen to the present position by leaps and bounds.
zh: 他飞速地晋升到了现在的职位。

en: He is a quick-witted man.
He ran on and on.
How fast does he run?
No matter how hard he may work, he will not be able to pass the exams.
zh: 无论他多么努力，他都无法通过考试。

en: He particularly liked history.
He likes swimming above all.
He can cut the cards well.
He hates falsehood more than anything else.
He doesn't have the time to play cards.
He is an easy mark at cards.
He's good at cards.
He shot a tiger through the head.
zh: 他一枪击中了老虎的头部。

en: He pulled aside to let a truck pass.
He's dry and unemotional.
He was knocked down by a truck.
He has a Toyota.
He tended to be lenient toward the children.
zh: 他往往对孩子们很宽容。

en: He's shorter than Tom.
He's much younger than Tom.
He saw Tom leave before the job was finished.
zh: 他看到汤姆在工作完成前离开了。

en: He is by far the most sensible.
He was doubtful about which way to take.
He is every bit a scholar.
What degree of interest did he show?
zh: 他对什么程度的事情感兴趣？

en: He can run as fast as any other boy.
zh: 他跑得和任何其他男孩一样快。

en: He works as hard as any student.
zh: 他像任何学生一样努力工作。

en: How did he work out the plan?
zh: 他是如何制定出这个计划的？

en: How did he work out the big problem?
zh: 他是怎么解决这个大问题的？

en: How long has he been absent?
How long has he lived in London?
He eats, breathes and sleeps computers.
zh: 他吃、呼吸、睡都离不开电脑。

en: He is Tony.
He's Tony.
He decided to stay and carry on his father's business.
zh: 他决定留下来继续他父亲的事业。

en: He is such a nice person that everybody likes him.
zh: 他是个非常好的人，大家都喜欢他。

en: He was such a bright boy others admired him.
zh: 他是个非常聪明的男孩，大家都羡慕他。

en: He's a very selfish person.
He is very careful.
Such was his eloquence that everybody was moved to tears.
zh: 他口才如此之好，以至于每个人都感动得流下了眼泪。

en: He is very rich, but he is none the happier for his wealth.
zh: 他很富有，但他并没有因为他的财富而更快乐。

en: He is so mild in disposition that I have never heard him speak in a loud voice.
zh: 他性格非常温和，我从未听过他大声说话。

en: He told us such a funny story that we all laughed.
zh: 他给我们讲了一个非常有趣的故事，我们都笑了。

en: He seems very busy. I can't come into contact with him.
zh: 他看起来很忙。我没法和他联系。

en: He is very afraid of his mother.
He is so impolite that everyone hates him.
zh: 他太不礼貌了，每个人都讨厌他。

en: He was so poor that he could not buy the bread.
He looks very tired.
He was so tired that he couldn't walk.
He was too tired to walk any farther.
He was very tired, so he went to bed early.
zh: 他很累，所以他早早就上床睡觉了。

en: As he was so tired, he fell fast asleep.
zh: 因为他太累了，所以他很快就睡着了。

en: Since he was very tired, he fell sound asleep.
zh: 因为他很累，所以他睡得很熟。

en: He was very tall, so I recognized him at once.
zh: 他个子很高，所以我一下子就认出他了。

en: He was very tired.
He is such a tall man that he can reach the ceiling.
zh: 他个子很高，能碰到天花板。

en: He was very old.
Although he is very old, he is strong.
zh: 虽然他年纪很大了，但是他很强壮。

en: He studies very hard.
He studies biology very hard.
zh: 他非常努力地学习生物学。

en: He can be reliable in that he is very patient.
zh: 他很可靠，因为他很有耐心。

en: He is too shy to talk to girls.
zh: 他太害羞了，不敢和女孩说话。

en: He is very bright, and what is more, he studies hard.
zh: 他非常聪明，而且更重要的是，他学习很努力。

en: He is very clever and is not proud either.
zh: 他很聪明，而且也不骄傲。

en: He is very angry.
He was too angry to speak.
He was so angry as to be unable to speak.
He was so angry he couldn't speak.
For all his efforts, he didn't succeed.
zh: 尽管他很努力，但他没有成功。

en: He was all attention.
He gave us such a long assignment that we protested.
zh: 他给我们布置了很长的作业，我们提出了抗议。

en: He wore a very loud necktie.
zh: 他戴了一条非常花哨的领带。

en: He is a very lazy boy.
zh: 他是个非常懒惰的男孩。

en: He is very fat, that is, he weighs 300 pounds.
zh: 他非常胖，也就是说，他重300磅。

en: He was so fat that he couldn't get through the hole.
zh: 他太胖了，过不去那个洞。

en: He walked so fast this I couldn't keep up with him.
zh: 他走得太快了，我跟不上他。

en: He can swim very fast.
He ran so fast that we couldn't catch up with him.
zh: 他跑得太快了，我们追不上他。

en: He is able to swim very fast.
He walked away too quickly for me to catch up with him.
zh: 他走得太快了，我追不上他。

en: He drives very fast.
He's so rude. I can't put up with his bad manners.
zh: 他太粗鲁了。我受不了他的坏 Manners。

en: He is very honest in business.
He is a very sincere person.
zh: 他是一个非常真诚的人。

en: He is so honest that I can count on him.
zh: 他非常诚实，所以我可以信任他。

en: He's very honest, so we can depend on him.
zh: 他很诚实，所以我们可以依靠他。

en: He's very honest, so we can rely on him.
zh: 他很诚实，所以我们可以依赖他。

en: He is very honest.
Though he is so worldly-wise, he is still very young.
zh: 虽然他很世故，但他仍然很年轻。

en: He would be the last person to betray others.
He looks very friendly, but I suspect him all the same.
zh: 他看起来很友善，但我仍然怀疑他。

en: He went through a very hard time.
zh: 他经历了一段非常艰难的时期。

en: He was so kind as to show her the way.
He is very friendly, so I enjoy working with him.
zh: 他很友善，所以我喜欢和他一起工作。

en: He is always kind enough to help me any time.
zh: 他总是很友善，随时帮助我。

en: He was kindness itself.
zh: 他简直就是善良的化身。

en: He really cares for his parents.
zh: 他真的很关心他的父母。

en: He can play tennis very well.
He is too sensitive.
He is a man of great importance.
zh: 他是一个非常重要的人物。

en: He is often taken for a student because he looks so young.
zh: 他经常被误认为是学生，因为他看起来很年轻。

en: He started going bald quite young.
zh: 他很年轻就开始秃顶了。

en: He's very young. He's much younger than Tom.
zh: 他很年轻。他比汤姆年轻多了。

en: He is very young.
He is a very thoughtful person.
He is a very modest man.
He has a very expensive watch.
zh: 他有一块非常昂贵的手表。

en: He is so aggressive that others avoid him.
zh: 他太有攻击性了，以至于别人都躲着他。

en: He feels very happy.
He seemed to have been very happy.
They looked very happy.
He was very thirsty and asked for some water.
He's very smart, so everybody likes him.
zh: 他很聪明，所以大家都喜欢他。

en: He is too smart not to know it.
zh: 他太聪明了，不可能不知道这件事。

en: He's very ill.
He is very sick.
He is anxious to see you.
He really wants to meet you.
He has a very surprising fancy.
zh: 他有一个非常令人惊讶的爱好。

en: He was so frightened that he could not speak for a moment.
zh: 他吓坏了，一时说不出话来。

en: He was so interested that he gave it his attention.
zh: 他非常感兴趣，所以全神贯注。

en: He became so excited that what he said made no sense at all.
zh: 他变得非常激动，以至于说的话语无伦次。

en: He is such a difficult boy.
He is as cross as a bear today.
He behaves in a very strange fashion.
He is strong as a horse.
He's as strong as a horse.
He is very a dangerous man.
He talks very cheerfully.
He seems very pleasant.
He was very fun.
Though he is very learned, he lacks common sense.
zh: 虽然他很有学问，但他缺乏常识。

en: He is too much of a coward to attempt it.
He is such a bad person that everybody dislikes him.
zh: 他是个很坏的人，所以每个人都不喜欢他。

en: He's a very romantic boyfriend who brings me flowers each night.
zh: 他是个非常浪漫的男朋友，每天晚上都给我带花。

en: He thinks that only very well trained actors can be really successful.
zh: 他认为只有训练有素的演员才能真正成功。

en: He has gained so much that he can soon go home from the hospital.
zh: 他恢复了很多，很快就可以从医院回家了。

en: He has gotten better, so he'll soon be able to leave the hospital.
zh: 他好多了，所以他很快就能出院了。

en: He asked a very good question.
zh: 他问了一个很好的问题。

en: He is a very good batter.
zh: 他是个非常优秀的击球手。

en: He is a very earnest person.
He made his suggestion very tactfully.
zh: 他非常委婉地提出了他的建议。

en: He fell lamentably short of his duty.
zh: 他可悲地没有尽到他的责任。

en: He is eager to go there.
I don't like him because he is sly as a fox.
zh: 我不喜欢他，因为他像狐狸一样狡猾。

en: He's a very fine musician.
zh: 他是个非常优秀的音乐家。

en: He is a good tennis player.
zh: 他是个优秀的网球运动员。

en: He is very stingy with his money.
He's very stingy.
He was such a nice boy that he was loved by everybody.
zh: 他是个非常好的男孩，所以每个人都喜欢他。

en: He had a very heavy study program.
zh: 他有一个非常繁重的学习计划。

en: He is very bright, and his brother is as bright.
zh: 他很聪明，他的兄弟也很聪明。

en: They say he is very rich.
